name: Extreme Ball Balance 3D
description:
Extreme Ball Balance 3D is a balancing game from impossible traps. There are some challenging tracks to roll the ball from one point and reach to the other end by crossing obstacles safely. This is very risky to control ball on floating bridge balance. Different hurdles may cause you to restrict going ahead towards finishing point. But you should not lose control over the impossible track ball. After passing one level the next level coming to it become harder and harder. In this Extreme Ball Balance 3D game, there will be new challenging traps, steep slopes, barriers, bends, hammers and dangerous areas to escape from.

Impossible ball runner game will take you engaged for long hours. Enjoy all the bridge balance game levels to balance the ball on impossible tracks. There are 10 different tracks for hell ball runner challenge. You can be the best scorer or coin collector of this ball balancer mania. Its thrilling game play provided quality graphics and environment best of all other balance games.
Extreme Ball Balance 3D Game Features:

- 10 Different wooden tracks for ball
- Best game play with stunning graphics and environment
- Astonishing animations with thrilling impossible tracks ball runner
- Different variety of balls in this balancing game
- Easy controls and user friendly interface

Download Extreme Ball Balance 3D to enjoy balancing impossible tracks and become an ultimate ball balancer. Never forget to rate and give your precious feedback for more improvements.
